.. _`bio/sambamba/index`:

SAMBAMBA INDEX
==============

Indexing a bam file with `sambamba https://lomereiter.github.io/sambamba/docs/sambamba-index.html`_


Example
-------

This wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule sambamba_index:
        input:
            "mapped/{sample}.bam"
        output:
            "mapped/{sample}.bam.bai"
        params:
            extra=""  # optional parameters
        log:
            "logs/sambamba-index/{sample}.log"
        threads: 8
        wrapper:
            "0.72.0-535-g3f43e007f/bio/sambamba/index"

Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.

Software dependencies
---------------------

* ``sambamba==0.8.0``

Input/Output
------------
**Input:**

* bam file

**Output:**

* bam index

Code

.. code-block:: python

    __author__ = "Jan Forster"
    __copyright__ = "Copyright 2021, Jan Forster"
    __email__ = "j.forster@dkfz.de"
    __license__ = "MIT"


    import os
    from snakemake.shell import shell

    log = snakemake.log_fmt_shell(stdout=True, stderr=True)

    shell(
        "sambamba index {snakemake.params.extra} -t {snakemake.threads} "
        "{snakemake.input[0]} {snakemake.output[0]} "
        "{log}"
    )
